thread.title: Everton eyeing Arsenal's Jack Wilshere for summer move as Ronald Koeman overhauls his midfield
thread.title_full: Everton eyeing Arsenal's Jack Wilshere for summer move as Ronald Koeman overhauls his midfield

author: Tom Hopkinson
title: Everton eyeing Arsenal's Jack Wilshere for summer move as Ronald Koeman overhauls his midfield
text:
Sport Everton eyeing Arsenal's Jack Wilshere for summer move as Ronald Koeman overhauls his midfield Manchester City are also monitoring the England midfielder, who has 18 months of his contract left and is currently playing for Bournemouth on loan Share Wilshere could provide the midfield creativity boss Ronald Koeman wants Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ronald Koeman will make Jack Wilshere a major summer target for Everton . 
The Goodison boss is a long-term admirer of the Arsenal and England midfielder, who is currently on a season-long loan at Bournemouth. 
Wilshere is out of contract in 18 months and the Gunners have a big decision to make on his future. 
Manchester City have already asked to be kept informed of any plans to sell him, and now Koeman is keen as well. 
The Dutchman, who hopes to sign Manchester United's Morgan Schneiderlin for his midfield this month, is on the lookout for a creative player — Wilshere fits that bill. There'll be plenty of Premier League interest in Wilshere if Wenger decides to sell (Photo: Getty) 
The Everton gaffer might struggle to match any terms on offer at the Etihad, but armed with new major shareholder Farhad Moshiri’s money they can certainly offer Wilshere big wages. 
Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger farmed the 25-year-old out to Bournemouth at the start of the campaign after a string of injuries had wrecked previous seasons. 
He has stayed fit in the first half of this campaign and impressed, particularly in recent weeks — something which has not gone unnoticed at the Emirates. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
